metadata.title: CVE-2022-26635 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.description: PHP-Memcached v2.2.0 and below contains an improper NULL termination which allows attackers to execute CLRF injection.

notes.note: ccdm94> no upstream patch available in 2022-05-19.

criterions.comment: php-memcached package in impish is affected and may need fixing.
